forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear. Low around 48, with temperatures rising to around 50 overnight. Northwest wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. Northwest wind around 8 mph.

weather_report:
As the city stirs softly in the early hours, San Francisco greets the day with a promise of clarity. A gentle coolness wraps the air, mingled with the faintest whisper of a breeze that carries tales from the north. The forecast hints at a gradual awakening, with temperatures poised around the comfortable low fifties before rising into the sun-kissed sixties. Though the skies remain predominantly clear, a cautious glance to the horizon reveals hints of the revered marine layer, lingering near the edges of the bridge, casting a delicate shroud over the bay.

Today beckons for humble pursuits—perhaps a stroll along the Embarcadero to welcome the sun’s ascent, where the rhythmic lapping of waves speaks of tranquility. Dressed in layers—light enough to revel in the warmth, yet substantial enough to ward off the morning chill—is wise. A light jacket or a cozy sweater will suffice as one navigates the crisp air and golden rays. As the day unfolds, serendipitous moments await; a favorite café might invite a pause, or a quiet bench at a local park could provide respite to observe the world gently unfold. In such a setting, amid the charm of the city, one finds solace and a chance to embrace life’s subtler melodies.
